title: Decent Player LF Ladder Climb Friends. (low silver atm, aiming plat) 72% winrate JG.
body:
{{champion:203}} {{champion:99}} 
Hey guys, looking for a group of chill friends on my list who are serious about the game and still like having fun.
I'm currently low silver and winning most games, I can't deal with the SOLO Q randoms anymore, 0/19's etc..

I main jungle / mid, but can also do other roles.
add me in game 'Fapanese' :)   
thankyou!

(also play with my real life friends who are high gold, add me and we can invite you for games)
PREF  sup/adc

replies.body:
IGN: Matthews
Mains: ADC, Supp, Jungle
im s5 wanting to climb

IGN:Evans
Mains: Mid,Bot
im silver4 in this silver but was in gold4 last season

IGN:TheGingninj69
Mains: Mid,Bot but is happy to play other roles if needed
Currently unranked this season but made it to silver promos from b1 last season
